Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Major in music or consent of chair; audition.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced instruction in voice. Intended for non-music majors.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVV 3431 and competence determined by faculty jury.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intensive advanced performance study of the voice, for performance majors.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Vocal function, anatomy, and pedagogical methodology as applied to the voice teacher and performer.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVV 2421 and competence determined by faculty jury.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continued study of performance skills of the voice, with additional intensive work expected for performance majors.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MVV 1411 and competence determined by faculty jury.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of MVV 1411. Major in music or consent of chair; audition. Private and class lessons.
